metadata.title: CVE-2017-2486 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar via acrafted web site.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
